author: Bang Xiao, Christina Zhou And Bill Birtles
title: Can coronavirus ground zero really return to normal after Wuhan's lockdown is lifted?
description: Wuhan residents have taken their first glimpse of normal life since the lockdown, but experts say it's unclear how long it will take for ground zero — and the world — to recover from a crisis of this scale.
content:
Posted 
April 01, 2020 06:05:15
As Wuhan, ground zero of the coronavirus pandemic, came to a standstill following the lockdown of its 11 million residents, the massive task ahead of Xiao Jinsong was just beginning.
